title: WTT: T206 Cobb EPDG for another Cobb
author: sportscardpete

posts.post_title: WTT: T206 Cobb EPDG for another Cobb
posts.post_content:
I don't care for backs at all so I would like to trade this cobb for another cobb with a more common back..

I am not looking to sell yet, just want to trade. Please PM or email me at pia nni [url]celli89@yahoo.com[/url]
